DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare pharmacokinetic 25 ( OH ) D 1,25 ( OH ) 2D response single oral dose vitamin D2 vitamin D3 group Stage 5-Chronic Kidney Disease subject require chronic hemodialysis .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Comparison Vitamin 's D2 D3 Stage 5 Chronic Kidney Disease Patients Chronic Hemodialysis
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , single blind , control study . Subjects randomly assign receive 1 ) placebo capsule ( control group ) ; 2 ) capsule ergocalciferol ( vitamin D2 group ) ; 3 ) capsule cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 group ) .
DOC.criteria: 30 men woman , age 2065 , BMI 1830 , require chronic hemodialysis They habitually consume less 16 oz milk per day get less 10 hour sun exposure per week . We exclude granulomatous condition , cirrhotic liver disease , take anticonvulsant , barbiturate , steroid form investigational drug within 4 week . We exclude pregnancy plan pregnancy , hypercalcemia ( > 10.4 mg/dl ) previously record , chronic GI disease would interfere absorption , allergy vitamin D3 , chronic vitamin D intake > 1,000 IU daily . Subjects continue take calcitriol analogue phosphorus binder prescribe nephrologist . Calcitriol analogues document remain constant throughout study .
